Title: Enacts safety requirements in stretch limousines including anti-intrusion bars and window break tools
Summary: Enacts safety requirements in stretch limousines including anti-intrusion bars and window break tools; reduces occupancy of omnibuses for purposes of being equipped with fire extinguishers and additional mirrors.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to safety requirements in stretch limousines and omnibuses
